page.title: 15A boy's leisure in Debenham.
page.content: This is how an eleven-year-old boy spent his spare time one week in July. Friday evening:-Ian went to Friday Club,a Christian youth club,and visited his Granny. Saturday:-He practised with the Debenham Boys'Football Club,swam at Crown Pools,Ipswich and visited the Amusement Park at Felixstowe. Sunday:-He went for a long walk,played pool with a friend,watched motorbike racing on TV,and earned a pound by washing a car. Monday evening:-Ian played football, rode his bike backwards and played "52 Bunker" with his neighbours. Tuesday evening:-He washed another car for a pound,helped his dad move some wood and watched TV. Wednesday evening:-He played with a cousin's baby .Thursday evening:-He used a friend's Citizens Band Radio.
